name: The Abyss (Astr0s, KatsuGimy)
description:
The Abyss is a 2d Adventure - Platformer made by 2 french where you must to find all the artefacts (3 available) into the giant hole.

----------------------------------------

Controls :

A  / Left arrow key - Left movement

D / Right arrow key - Right movement

Space - Jump

W / Up arrow - Climb the ladders

S / Down Key - fall

E - Open inventory

Escape - Open pause menu

F - Raise the artefacts to the surface

Place artefacts into one of the three right inventory's location to use them.
